name: Feline for Product Hunt
tagline: A beautiful, Open Source unofficial Desktop App for Product hunt
body: ![Feline](http://i.imgur.com/pREGiX8.jpg "Mockup") ---------- ## :cloud: Download ### Feline ( Mac ) v0.0.1 beta ### Feline ( Windows ) v0.0.1 beta ## :blush: Contribute * Feature Request, Bugs and Ideas can be added [here.](https://github.com/arjunkomath/Feline-Desktop-App/issues) ## :two_hearts: Thanks * [Product Hunt Team :)](https://www.producthunt.com/about) * [Github - Electron](http://electron.atom.io/) ## :heart_eyes: About Author * Built with <3 by [Arjun Komath](https://twitter.com/arjunz) / [arjunkomath@gmail.com](mailto:arjunkomath@gmail.com) ## :copyright: License * See the [LICENSE](https://github.com/arjunkomath/Feline-Desktop-App/blob/master/LICENSE) file for license rights and limitations (MIT).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
